content: **the english version is now awailable ** hello this is my first knitting pattern and i am so excited to share it with you the helix brioche hat is a 2-colour-brioche hat made with the basic brioche stiches it is a fitted hat however it can easily be modified if you rather want a taller piece in this pattern i have also included my own picture tutorial on the basic brioche stitches and terms i hope you find it helpful and that it will help you make some beautiful hats i feel so excided every time someone shares their project with me so please do you can send it to me personally tag it as a project here on ravelry or share in social media with **#helixbriochehat** and **#madebytollow** do not hesitate to contact me if you have any questions love /jonatan tollow **additional notes ** *- a big thanks to wildmustard 1 for helping me with the english version of this pattern * *- if you want a longer version you can repeat the pattern three times before reducing to shape the top there is a picture of the longer version if you want to see to the left d * 1 https //www ravelry com/people/wildmustard
